content.raw:
I was testing on my local machine the Wireless test suite since problems appeared frequently in jenkins. I used the gazebo branch (improve_serverfixture_msgs) which provide meaningful error messages. I found:

A failure in **WirelessTransmitter_TEST.TestInvalidFreq**
```
101: [ RUN      ] WirelessTransmitter_TEST.TestInvalidFreq
101: 
101: Msg Waiting for masterMsg Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
101: Msg Publicized address: 192.168.0.210
101: Dbg ServerFixture load in 0.13 seconds, timeout after 60 seconds
101: /root/gazebo/test/ServerFixture.hh:1003: Failure
101: Failed
101: ServerFixture timeout: max number of retries (1000) exceeded.
101: [  FAILED  ] WirelessTransmitter_TEST.TestInvalidFreq (101366 ms)
```

Onether different fail in **WirelessTransmitter_TEST.TestUpdateImplNoVisual**
```
101: [ RUN      ] WirelessTransmitter_TEST.TestUpdateImplNoVisual
101: 
101: Msg Waiting for masterMsg Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
101: Msg Publicized address: 192.168.0.210
101: Dbg ServerFixture load in 0.14 seconds, timeout after 60 seconds
101: /root/gazebo/test/ServerFixture.hh:1003: Failure
101: Failed
101: ServerFixture timeout: max number of retries (1000) exceeded.
```
But other times the erros are not appearing, I would bet to a race condition somewhere.
content.html:
I was testing on my local machine the Wireless test suite since problems appeared frequently in jenkins. I used the gazebo branch (improve_serverfixture_msgs) which provide meaningful error messages. I found:

A failure in WirelessTransmitter_TEST.TestInvalidFreq

101: [ RUN      ] WirelessTransmitter_TEST.TestInvalidFreq
101: 
101: Msg Waiting for masterMsg Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
101: Msg Publicized address: 192.168.0.210
101: Dbg ServerFixture load in 0.13 seconds, timeout after 60 seconds
101: /root/gazebo/test/ServerFixture.hh:1003: Failure
101: Failed
101: ServerFixture timeout: max number of retries (1000) exceeded.
101: [  FAILED  ] WirelessTransmitter_TEST.TestInvalidFreq (101366 ms)

Onether different fail in WirelessTransmitter_TEST.TestUpdateImplNoVisual

101: [ RUN      ] WirelessTransmitter_TEST.TestUpdateImplNoVisual
101: 
101: Msg Waiting for masterMsg Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
101: Msg Publicized address: 192.168.0.210
101: Dbg ServerFixture load in 0.14 seconds, timeout after 60 seconds
101: /root/gazebo/test/ServerFixture.hh:1003: Failure
101: Failed
101: ServerFixture timeout: max number of retries (1000) exceeded.

But other times the erros are not appearing, I would bet to a race condition somewhere.
